page.title: 20The Game of Marbles
page.content: To play marbles you need some little round glass balls, about 1.5cm in diameter. The game can be played between two or three children. Some only play against their friends. Most marbles are coloured with 1, 2 or 3 colours. Some children think that the brightly coloured ones are more valuable. There are different games to play with marbles. In one game the first player rolls the marble towards a small hole, the other players do the same. The player whose marble is nearest to the hole, or is in it, thentakes another shot. And the game continues. The object is for all the players to get their marbles in the hole. The last player to get a marble in the hole is the winner, and the prize is all the marbles in the hole.
